requirement_tested: Implement office management module with form design and workflow capabilities
user_persona: An administrative officer who needs to set up a new office seating arrangement request form.
user_goal: To create and configure a workflow for office seating change requests.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Office Management Module
narrative_steps.description: Sarah logs into the system and navigates to the office management dashboard where she sees tabs for office information, form design, and workflow configuration.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the office management module and locate the dashboard tabs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The office management dashboard loads showing office locations, departments, and personnel assignments with accessible tabs for form design and workflow configuration.

narrative_steps.title: Designing New Form
narrative_steps.description: Sarah clicks on the 'Design Form' tab to create a new seating arrangement request form using the integrated form builder.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Design Form' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form builder interface from formBuilderLibrary loads within the module, allowing Sarah to design her form.

narrative_steps.title: Configuring Workflow
narrative_steps.description: After saving her form, Sarah moves to configure the approval workflow by clicking the 'Configure Workflow' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Configure Workflow' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The workflow engine interface from workflowEngineAPI loads, enabling Sarah to define and save the approval process for seating requests.

requirement_tested: Implement infrastructure management module with asset tracking and maintenance workflows
user_persona: A facilities manager responsible for maintaining office equipment.
user_goal: To register a new printer and schedule its first maintenance check.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Infrastructure Module
narrative_steps.description: Mike enters the infrastructure management section to manage company assets and sees a list of existing equipment.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the infrastructure management module.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Asset grid displays with categories, statuses, and maintenance history of tracked assets.

narrative_steps.title: Scanning New Asset
narrative_steps.description: Mike clicks 'Scan Asset' to add a newly purchased printer to the system using the asset tracking API.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Scan Asset' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Integration with assetTrackingAPI is triggered, opening a scanner interface or form to input new asset details which are then saved.

narrative_steps.title: Scheduling Maintenance
narrative_steps.description: Once registered, Mike schedules the printer's first maintenance by clicking the 'Schedule Maintenance' option.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Schedule Maintenance' button for the newly added printer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A new log entry is created in the maintenance_logs table with the scheduled maintenance details.

requirement_tested: Implement procurement management module with purchasing processes and vendor management
user_persona: A procurement officer who needs to initiate a new purchase request.
user_goal: To submit a requisition for new office supplies and get it approved.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Vendor Information
narrative_steps.description: Lisa accesses the procurement module and reviews the list of active vendors retrieved from the vendor management API.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the procurement management module.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Active vendors from vendorManagementAPI are displayed along with current purchase orders and requisitions.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Requisition
narrative_steps.description: Lisa decides to order more stationery and clicks 'New Requisition' to start the procurement process.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'New Requisition' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigates to a form for submitting procurement requests where Lisa can fill out item details.

narrative_steps.title: Approving Purchase Order
narrative_steps.description: After her manager approves the requisition, Lisa converts it to a purchase order and clicks 'Approve Order' to finalize it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Approve Order' button for the converted requisition.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The status field in the purchase_orders table is updated to reflect the approved status.

requirement_tested: Implement personnel management module with employee records and role-based access control
user_persona: An HR specialist managing employee information and access rights.
user_goal: To review an employee's role permissions and update their access level.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Employee Directory
narrative_steps.description: John opens the personnel management module and searches for an employee in the organizational directory.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the personnel management module and search for an employee.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Searchable directory of employees is shown with organizational chart and individual profiles accessible.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Employee Details
narrative_steps.description: He clicks on the employee's card to expand their detailed view including current role and permissions.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an employee card to expand details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Employee's detailed profile is displayed including role-specific permissions retrieved from employeeDirectoryAPI.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Role Assignment
narrative_steps.description: Seeing that the employee has been promoted, John clicks 'Edit Role' to assign them a higher access level.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit Role' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Role editing interface appears allowing John to update the role_id field in the employees table.

requirement_tested: Implement financial management module with budget tracking and expense processing
user_persona: A finance officer monitoring departmental budgets and processing claims.
user_goal: To check departmental budget status and approve a pending expense claim.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Budget Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Emma visits the financial management dashboard to compare actual spending against allocated budgets.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the financial management module.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard presents comparison of actual vs. allocated budgets per department using real-time data from budgetTrackingAPI.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting an Expense Claim
narrative_steps.description: She notices a pending expense submission and clicks 'Submit Expense' to review and process it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Expense' button for a pending claim.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Expense form opens allowing Emma to validate inputs before saving to the expenses table.

narrative_steps.title: Approving the Expense
narrative_steps.description: After verifying receipts, Emma clicks 'Approve' to authorize payment of the expense.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Approve' button for the validated expense.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The approval_status field in the expenses table is updated to reflect the approved state.

requirement_tested: Implement decision-making management module with reporting and analytics dashboards
user_persona: A senior manager needing insights from operational data.
user_goal: To generate a performance report and analyze key metrics visually.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Analytics Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Robert enters the decision-making module and views interactive charts showing aggregated business metrics.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the decision-making management module.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive charts and graphs built with analyticsDashboardLibrary display aggregated metrics from the metrics table.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Performance Report
narrative_steps.description: He identifies a need for a comprehensive quarterly report and clicks 'Generate Report' to create it.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A new record is inserted into the reports table and corresponding metric entries are generated automatically.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Data Points
narrative_steps.description: While reviewing the report, Robert clicks on a specific chart element to drill down into underlying data details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a chart element to filter data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Underlying data points are filtered based on selected dimensions providing more focused analysis.

requirement_tested: Provide user authentication and authorization system with role-based permissions
user_persona: A regular employee accessing the system for daily tasks.
user_goal: To securely log into the system and access authorized features only.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Login Process
narrative_steps.description: David arrives at the login page which features a clean form with light pink background and medium violet red buttons.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the login page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Login form with username/password fields and a 'Login' button is displayed with specified color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Authenticating Credentials
narrative_steps.description: David enters his credentials and clicks the 'Login' button to gain access to the system.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid username and password, then click the 'Login' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Credentials are sent to authSystemAPI and a valid session token is stored in the sessions table, granting access.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out Securely
narrative_steps.description: At the end of his workday, David clicks 'Logout' to securely end his session.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Logout' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session token is deleted from both client and sessions table, effectively logging David out.

requirement_tested: Enable users to browse related information across all management modules
user_persona: A project coordinator looking for cross-functional information.
user_goal: To find relevant data about ongoing projects across different departments.

narrative_steps.title: Using Global Search Feature
narrative_steps.description: Anna notices the global search bar at the top and begins typing keywords related to her project inquiry.
narrative_steps.action: Locate and begin typing in the global search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Debounced calls are made to searchServiceAPI which returns filtered results grouped by module type.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Search Results
narrative_steps.description: As she types, relevant results from various modules appear below the search bar, helping her narrow down her focus.
narrative_steps.action: Continue typing to refine search results.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results are dynamically updated showing matches from office, procurement, personnel, and other modules.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Specific Information
narrative_steps.description: Anna clicks on the most relevant result to view detailed information about a specific procurement related to her project.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific search result.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation occurs to the specific entity page within its respective module, displaying full details.

requirement_tested: Allow users to submit applications through digital forms with workflow routing
user_persona: An employee requesting official equipment through the procurement process.
user_goal: To submit a procurement request form and attach necessary documentation.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Digital Form
narrative_steps.description: James receives a link to a procurement request form and opens it, seeing a pre-filled digital form rendered properly.
narrative_steps.action: Open the unique URL to access the digital form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Digital form is rendered using digitalFormRenderer showing all required fields ready for completion.

narrative_steps.title: Attaching Supporting Documents
narrative_steps.description: Before submitting, James clicks 'Attach File' to upload quotes from suppliers as supporting documentation.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Attach File' button and upload documents.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Documents are uploaded and references are added to the application_attachments table.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: With all information entered and documents attached, James clicks 'Submit Application' to send his request.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Application' button after validating all inputs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Data is posted to submissionWorkflowAPI which validates inputs and updates the status in the applications table.

requirement_tested: Implement approval workflows with multi-level authorization capabilities
user_persona: A department head reviewing multiple approval requests.
user_goal: To evaluate and decide on pending procurement approvals requiring his authorization.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Approval Queue
narrative_steps.description: Patricia logs in and immediately sees her approval queue showing pending procurement requests awaiting her review.
narrative_steps.action: Log into the system and navigate to the approval section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Queue of pending approvals relevant to Patricia is displayed with application details and action buttons.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Request Details
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on one of the pending items to examine the full context of the procurement request before making a decision.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a pending approval item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Full application context including requester details and item specifications is revealed for review.

narrative_steps.title: Making Approval Decision
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the request details, Patricia clicks 'Approve' to move the procurement forward in the workflow.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Approve' button for the reviewed request.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Decision is sent to approvalRoutingAPI which updates the approvals table and advances the workflow accordingly.

requirement_tested: Enable status querying for all submitted applications and processes
user_persona: An applicant checking the progress of their submitted requests.
user_goal: To track the current status and history of their leave application.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Status Query Interface
narrative_steps.description: Tom navigates to the status query section to check on his recently submitted leave application.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the status querying interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Timeline view showing historical status updates fetched from statusQueryAPI is presented with filtering options.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Detailed Status History
narrative_steps.description: He clicks on his leave application to see the complete timeline of status changes and decision points.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific process instance (leave application).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Expanded view shows detailed status_updates messages providing a clear audit trail of the application progress.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Current Status
narrative_steps.description: To ensure he has the latest information, Tom clicks 'Refresh Status' to get any recent updates.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Refresh Status' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Latest updates are re-fetched from statusQueryAPI and the timeline is redrawn with current information.

requirement_tested: Include leave management functionality with request and approval workflows
user_persona: An employee planning time off for personal reasons.
user_goal: To request annual leave and await approval from their supervisor.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Leave Calendar
narrative_steps.description: Emily opens the leave management section and views the calendar showing already approved leaves.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the leave management module.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Calendar-style interface visualizes approved leaves and provides a panel for submitting new leave requests.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Leave Request
narrative_steps.description: She selects her desired dates and clicks 'Request Leave' to open the leave request form.
narrative_steps.action: Select dates and click 'Request Leave'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: leaveRequestForm modal opens allowing Emily to enter details and submit data to leaveManagementAPI.

narrative_steps.title: Awaiting Approval Decision
narrative_steps.description: Her supervisor receives the request and clicks 'Approve/Deny' to either grant or reject Emily's leave.
narrative_steps.action: Supervisor clicks 'Approve/Deny' for the submitted leave request.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Status column in the leave_requests table is updated reflecting the supervisor's decision.

requirement_tested: Implement middle-level cadres leaving Shenzhen tracking with special approval processes
user_persona: A mid-level cadre planning to travel outside Shenzhen for personal reasons.
user_goal: To officially declare travel plans and obtain necessary approvals.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Travel Declaration Section
narrative_steps.description: Michael, a middle-level cadre, goes to the travel declaration section to inform authorities of his upcoming trip.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the travel declaration section within the system.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of travel declarations submitted by cadres is displayed along with their current approval stages and filter options.

narrative_steps.title: Declaring Travel Plans
narrative_steps.description: He fills in his travel details and clicks 'Declare Travel' to formally notify the organization of his plans.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in travel details and click 'Declare Travel'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: travelDeclarationForm is opened and submission is routed through specialApprovalWorkflowAPI for processing.

narrative_steps.title: Handling Escalation Needs
narrative_steps.description: When his direct supervisor doesn't respond promptly, Michael's assistant clicks 'Escalate Approval' to advance the request.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Escalate Approval' button for the pending travel declaration.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Declaration is manually advanced to the next approver level in the cadre_profiles hierarchy as defined.

requirement_tested: Include attendance management with time tracking and reporting features
user_persona: An employee starting their workday and later generating monthly reports.
user_goal: To clock in for work and produce an attendance summary for payroll purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Recording Daily Check-In
narrative_steps.description: At the start of her shift, Lisa clicks 'Check In' to record her arrival time accurately.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Check In' button upon arriving at work.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current timestamp is recorded in the attendance_records table via attendanceTrackerAPI.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Attendance Summary
narrative_steps.description: Later, Lisa reviews her daily logs and monthly summaries to verify accuracy before month-end reporting.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to attendance summary views.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Daily attendance logs and monthly summaries are displayed showing hours worked and absences.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Attendance Report
narrative_steps.description: For payroll processing, Lisa clicks 'Export Report' to generate a formatted document of her attendance data.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: attendanceReportingAPI is called to generate a downloadable PDF or Excel summary of attendance records.

requirement_tested: Implement 'five powers' management with customizable form designs and process circulation
user_persona: An administrator tasked with creating compliance forms for internal audits.
user_goal: To design a new compliance form and initiate its circulation among relevant stakeholders.

narrative_steps.title: Designing Compliance Form
narrative_steps.description: Robert accesses the 'five powers' management interface and clicks to create a new form using advanced conditional logic.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to 'five powers' management and click to design a new form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interface with tabs for designing new forms using fivePowersFormBuilder is accessible for form creation.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Form Structure
narrative_steps.description: After configuring all necessary fields and conditions, he clicks 'Save Form Design' to store the blueprint.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Form Design' button after completing form configuration.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form structure is serialized into JSON format and stored in the power_forms table with metadata.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Document Circulation
narrative_steps.description: With the form ready, Robert clicks 'Start Circulation' to distribute it to designated reviewers according to established protocols.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Start Circulation' button for the saved form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: circulationEngineAPI is triggered which populates circulation_paths table according to predefined stakeholder rules.
